lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: How did God create the first man?
answers: Formed him out of dust and breathed life into him
Spoke and he appeared instantly
Formed him from water and clay
Shaped him from a tree trunk

questions.text: Where did God put the man he made? What job did he give him?
answers: The Garden of Eden, to take care of it
A tent in the wilderness, to gather food
A mountain cave, to guard the animals
A tower, to watch over the land

questions.text: What did God say was “not good”?
answers: That the man was alone
That the animals needed new names
That the garden was too quiet
That the man had no house

questions.text: What did God say he would make for the man?
answers: A helper fit for him
A kingdom to rule
A shelter for the night
A servant to gather food

questions.text: When God brought the animals to the man, what did the man do?
answers: Name them
Count them
Choose some as pets
Build shelters for them

questions.text: After naming all the animals, what did the man not find?
answers: A helper fit for him
A favorite animal
A friend to explore with
A creature that looked like him

questions.text: How did God make a helper for the man?
answers: Put him to sleep, took a rib from his side, and formed a woman
Asked the man to choose an animal to transform
Shaped her from the dust while Adam watched
Formed her from water and breathed life into her

questions.text: When God brought the woman to the man, what did the man say?
answers: This is bone of my bones, flesh of my flesh; she’ll be called woman
Thank you, Lord, for giving me a companion
She is strong and beautiful
She will help me care for the animals

questions.text: Both the man and the woman were made in God’s... what?
answers: Image and likeness
Strength and beauty
Power and glory
Wisdom and knowledge

questions.text: What did God tell the man and woman to do?
answers: Fill the earth and rule over it
Stay in one place and keep the garden small
Build a tower and remain in Eden forever
Travel and name more animals
